# mathspan

```````````````````````````````` example
# Heading

$\alpha\beta*2^{3i}$

Next paragraph
.
<h1>Heading</h1>
<p><span class="mathexpr">\alpha\beta*2^{3i}</span></p>
<p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
# Heading

$ \alpha\beta*2^{3i} $

Next paragraph
.
<h1>Heading</h1>
<p>$ \alpha\beta*2^{3i} $</p>
<p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
Initial Text
$\alpha\beta*2^{3i}$
.
<p>Initial Text
<span class="mathexpr">\alpha\beta*2^{3i}</span></p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
$\alpha\beta*2^{3i}$
Next paragraph
.
<p><span class="mathexpr">\alpha\beta*2^{3i}</span>
Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
# Heading

$\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}$

Next paragraph
.
<h1>Heading</h1>
<p><span class="mathexpr">\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}</span></p>
<p>Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
$\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}$
Next paragraph
.
<p><span class="mathexpr">\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}</span>
Next paragraph</p>

````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
# Heading
$\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}$
Next paragraph
.
<h1>Heading</h1>
<p><span class="mathexpr">\alpha
\beta
*2^{3i}</span>
Next paragraph</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
This starts the line : $\alpha\beta*2^{3i}$ and this continues the line.
.
<p>This starts the line : <span class="mathexpr">\alpha\beta*2^{3i}</span> and this continues the line.</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
This starts the line : $ \alpha\beta*2^{3i} $ and this continues the line.
.
<p>This starts the line : $ \alpha\beta*2^{3i} $ and this continues the line.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
Test single character

$k$

Math span.
.
<p>Test single character</p>
<p><span class="mathexpr">k</span></p>
<p>Math span.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
Test single character

$ k $

Math span.
.
<p>Test single character</p>
<p>$ k $</p>
<p>Math span.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
Test single character
$k$
Math span.
.
<p>Test single character
<span class="mathexpr">k</span>
Math span.</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
.
<p>Test single character
<span class="mathexpr">k</span>
Math span.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
I have some money $.
.
<p>I have some money $.</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
I have some money $$.
.
<p>I have some money $$.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
I have all sorts of $$$$.
.
<p>I have all sorts of $$$$.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
I have $5 and you have $10.
.
<p>I have $5 and you have $10.</p>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
I have 5$ and you have 10$.
.
<p>I have 5$ and you have 10$.</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
I have $5 and you
have $10.
.
<p>I have $5 and you
have $10.</p>
````````````````````````````````
